translations.translation: The heavens will be opened wide and turn into so many doors,
and when the sky shall be opened up and will become all doors;
The heavens will have openings like doors.
And the heaven will be opened – it therefore becomes like gates.
And the heaven shall be opened, and it will become as gates.
And the heaven shall be opened so that it shall be all openings,
and heaven is opened, and become gates,
And the heaven is opened and becometh as gates,
and the heaven shall be opened, and become gates,
And the heaven will have been opened, and it will have become doors.
and the sky will be opened and become gates,
And the heavens shall be opened as if there were doors,
And the heaven shall be opened, and it will become as gates,
and heaven is opened, having gates,
And the sky is opened up, and becomes gateways.
And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
[78:19] and the heaven is opened (read futtihat or futihat), sundered for the descent of the angels, and becomes as gates, it becomes [a heaven] with gates,
(And the heaven is opened) and the gates of heaven are opened (and becometh as gates) and becomes different roads,

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: { وفتحت } سماء الروح عند العود إلى البدن بأبواب الحواس الظاهرة والباطنة { فكانت أبواباً } أي: ذات أبواب كثيرة هي طرق الشعور كأنه كلها أبوابها لكثرتها

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } يومئذٍ { فُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ } أي: خرقت وشقت { فَكَانَتْ } الخرق والشقوق لها { أَبْوَاباً } [النبأ: 19]

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وفُتِحت السماءُ } أي: تشققت لنزول الملائكة، وصيغة الماضي لتحقُّق وقوعه، { فكانت أبواباً } فصارت ذات أبواب وطرق وفروج وما لها اليومَ من فُروج
